subject: Re: [junit] jUnit bug? textui - no errors, gui - errors.
msgSnippet: ... Perhaps. There s a Java property called user.home or something that JUnit might be using. The JUnit source is available; you can figure out where it s
messageBody:
"Bret Waldow" <Bret.Waldow@...> wrote:
> I suspect the system might maintain some network directory as my "home" that
> I don't know about?

Perhaps. There's a Java property called "user.home" or something that JUnit
might be using. The JUnit source is available; you can figure out where it's
trying to save the properties file and try to debug it.

Or maybe it's some other problem. Again, the source code might be your best
bet.



Erik
